data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea obovata (Sibirean spruce) from sample OZERLAPC-111

Exposition SW, Slope 3 deg, Geology: Moräne mit org. Auflage, av. Tree height 12 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 30%, Herb cover 75%, Moss cover 95%, Vegatation type: PCOB-BEPU-Wald mit LASI, Film number: 874A
